page.title: 17The Village Shop
page.content: The Shop has been there for about 10 years. There are three people who work there. Two people live in Welshampton and one lives in Shrewsbury. It sells a wide range of goods. It is self-service. Friday is the busiest day of the week. There have been a lot of changes recently. Diesel is sold as well as petrol. Village people use the shop most. It is used by holiday people from the canal. Milk and bread sell best. The owners have no future changes in mind as the shop was changed to self-service fairly recently.
